name: Mango Basil Chicken and Brown Rice Salad
author: Minute Rice
summary: Serve as a salad or even a wrap ... zippy balsamic vinaigrette, fresh basil and mango, with chicken and whole-grain brown rice.  Oh, and, don't forget the cheese.
ingredients: 2 cups cooked chicken, cooled and coarsely chopped
1 ½ cups cooked Minute® Brown Rice, cooled
1 cup fresh mango, peeled and chopped
1 cup grape or cherry tomatoes, halved
4  large green lettuce leaves, washed and dried
directions: In bottom of large bowl, combine bottled dressing and basil
Add chicken, brown rice, mango, and tomatoes
To serve: Place 1 lettuce leaf onto each of 4 serving plates
Divide salad mixture evenly and place into center of lettuce leaves
Garnish top of each serving with an equal amount of crumbled goat cheese
